item.description:
新发现🥜

  1. 完善主题切换功能，支持自适应系统主题，修复列表选择行为，提升文件类型检测准确性。
  2. 目录导航和图片功能增强 - 新增 TOC 目录模式自动生成文章导航，支持 PicList 图床上传，支持引用任意位置的本地图片
  3. 编辑效率提升 - 支持 Tab 快捷键模板一键输入，文件自动检测刷新，编辑器底部留白优化
  4. PPT 演示模式增强 - 支持更多自定义配置参数，样式大幅优化，演示效果更专业
  5. 预览渲染大幅升级 - 整体预览效果和交互体验提升，优化 Mermaid、Markmap、PlantUML 等图表样式，改进代码块和内联代码显示
  6. 关键 Bug 修复 - 修复长时间使用后预览样式失效，修复编辑时可能崩溃问题，修复笔记列表展开折叠逻辑异常
  7. 性能和体验改进 - 大幅提升内容搜索速度，优化导出功能解决超时问题，禁用弹性滚动使操作更精准
  8. 代码架构重构 - DownView 预览组件和侧边栏逻辑重构，样式文件模块化便于维护，甚至支持 VSCode 开发了

New Discoveries🥜

  1. Improve the theme switching function, support adaptive system themes, fix list selection behavior, and improve the accuracy of file type detection.
  2. Enhanced Navigation & Image Support – Added automatic TOC (Table of Contents) generation for article navigation, PicList image-hosting uploads, and support for referencing local images from any location.
  3. Improved Editing Efficiency – Quick template insertion via the Tab key, automatic file change detection and refresh, and optimized bottom spacing in the editor.
  4. Upgraded PPT Presentation Mode – More customizable configuration parameters, substantially refined styles, and a more professional presentation experience.
  5. Major Preview Rendering Upgrade – Overall improvements to preview visuals and interactions; optimized styles for Mermaid, Markmap, and PlantUML; and better code block and inline code display.
  6. Key Bug Fixes – Fixed preview styles failing after long sessions, resolved potential editor crashes, and corrected abnormal expand/collapse logic in the notes list.
  7. Performance & UX Improvements – Significantly faster content search, optimized export to avoid timeouts, and disabled elastic scrolling for more precise operations.
  8. Code Architecture Refactor – Rebuilt the DownView preview component and sidebar logic, modularized style files for easier maintenance, and even enabled development in VS Code.

新面孔 🎉

  1. 全新图标设计更清晰美观，主题切换更流畅，分割线与背景色更统一
  2. 支持顶部导航和快捷键操作，ESC/→ 键切换更便捷
  3. 设置面板重构，字体和语言设置体验优化
  4. 修复标题和搜索框切换问题，搜索框标准化，搜索逻辑优化支持空输入
  5. 异步图片上传更丝滑，预览性能优化，编辑状态下体验更一致
  6. 导出效果优化，生成内容更加稳定，排版显示更精致
  7. 项目全面升级到 Swift 6，优化代码实现和注释，适配新特性提升应用性能和稳定性
  8. 移除推荐字体依赖，代码结构重构，撤销重做功能优化并修复字体选择问题

New Face 🎉

  1. Brand-new icon design clearer and more beautiful, smoother theme switching with standardized divider colors and unified background
  2. Support top navigation and shortcut key operation, ESC/→ key switching is more convenient
  3. Settings panel redesigned, improved font & language experience
  4. Fixed title and search box switching issues, standardized search box, optimized search behavior to handle empty input
  5. Asynchronous image upload for smoother experience, optimized preview performance, improved consistency in editing state
  6. Optimized export effects with more stable output and refined layout display
  7. Comprehensive upgrade to Swift 6 with optimized code implementation and annotations, adapted to new features for improved performance and stability
  8. Removed recommended font dependencies, refactored code structure, optimized undo/redo functionality and fixed font selection issues
